name: Jonrik, Fists of Hamon
text:
: As long as it’s your turn, Jonrik, Fists of Hamon is a 4/4 Human Fighter creature that’s still a planeswalker. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Jonrik, Fists of Hamon during your turn.

Whenever Jonrik, Fists of Hamon is blocked, put a loyalty counter on it.
